title: Is there anything I can do against Xin Zhao as Lucian ADC?
body:
I've versed xin quite a few times now, and when the xin is good/builds right I can't do much against him. Just note, I play normals and I'm not an amazing adc. It isn't that I can't 'outplay' him. It's that anything I do against him is negligible. he just shrugs it off. As an adc, I can't damage him enough to do anything. I can easily beat the other four on the team, but I'm useless against xin and my team can't even kite him enough to get him off me. It just feels so frustrating to play against him because I feel I can't do anything.

The usual build I run when I'm facing xin is Infinity Edge, Phantom Dancer, Essence Reaver and a mix of QSS/Mortal Reminder (grievous wounds)/Black Cleaver

When i try to run Mortal Reminder against him he still heals a ton through it, and my armor pen does next to nothing to penetrate his defenses so I'm a  bit lost. I haven't tried Blade of the Ruined King because I'm lazy with actives. Would this possibly give me enough damage to vs him? Is there any other item/strategy I can try?

replies.body:
Pretty much the only way to beat Xin as an ADC is to kite him...
The problem is: when they updated him they made him invulnerable unless you're in melee range, and gave him a long range slow. So you literally CANT kite him.

Good old rito logic.

Use your dash (away) to counter his E, stay away from the third hit of his Q.
Basically you need someone with CC to back you up.

It's not what I do, it's that my damage is so irrelevant even if I play well against him. I can probably tank around 30% of his health at most when I verse him, and then he just heals it all back up even through grievous wounds. He 1v5'd my entire team because of it last game (he and I were the only fed ones). As an adc, I should be able to do more against him but I just haven't been able to no matter what I've built.
